ygData.subject: Re: are there any master fletcher's on this board
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) I have no knowledge of Steel or Ceramic Bow Staffs being in-game. 2) Individual components of Arrows say Magic Item. Does anyone know if the arrows we make
ygData.messageBody:
1) I have no knowledge of Steel or Ceramic Bow Staffs being in-game.

2) Individual components of Arrows say Magic Item. Does anyone know if the
arrows we make hit magical creatures? I am a Mag so I can't even use any of
the Bows I make.

3) Anyone on E'Ci want a Carved 1-Cam Oak Bow. Made it to test Cam stats
and now I am stuck with it. I'll cut you a nice deal near cost, I just want
my 140 plat back!

Charles

>
>I guess I do have a question. I have seen listed a steal bow and a ceramic
>bow... anyone know where to find these or is it a not implemented item(s) so
>far? or do you have to start blacksmithing and ceramic skills to make the
>items? Also anyone find any magic arrows, so we can hit wisps, and ghouls,
>etc?
>
>Also, I haven't checked the entire city (again) lately so they could have
>added the items and I would not know about it.
>
>David
>

Xezol - Lvl 14 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
